abstract: Reader reaction to an earlier Goal blog post about spotting jerseys on the streets of New York.
snippet: Reader reaction to an earlier Goal blog post about spotting jerseys on the streets of New York.
lead_paragraph: We got a good reaction to our post last week about spotting soccer jerseys in New York. Nicholas Felice was the first to respond to our request for photos; that's him at right in his 2000-01 Roma jersey -- "the year they won the Scudetto," he made a point to add -- but others had some interesting contributions, too.

headline.main: From Jerseys on the Streets to Jerseys in Your Closets
